mapper.select:
SELECT l.num, l.mem_num, l.booknum, to_char(l.startdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') startdate, to_char(l.enddate,'yyyy.mm.dd') enddate, to_char(l.returndate,'yyyy.mm.dd') returndate, b.title, m.name, l.status FROM lend l, books b, member m WHERE l.booknum=b.num AND l.mem_num=m.student_num AND l.status=#{status}
ORDER BY startdate
ORDER BY enddate
ORDER BY enddate
AND
b.title LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
m.name LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
mapper.update: UPDATE lend SET status = 'delayed' WHERE sysdate > enddate+1 AND status != 'delay_returned'
